concept.title: Add plot style table dialog box
concept.shortdesc: The Add Plot Style Table Dialog Box allows you to create new plot styles.

conbody.p: If the drawing uses named plot styles, the wizard creates a new named plot style table (STB file). If the current drawing does not use named plot styles, the wizard creates a new color-dependent table (CTB file).

ol.li: Use this Plotstyle for the current drawing

section.title: Table name
section.p: Enter the name you want to give to the plot style table.

section.title: Launch Editor
section.p: Opens the Plot style table editor dialog box after you enter the name and press the OK button.

section.title: Use this Plotstyle for the current drawing
section.p: If you do not check the Launch Editor option, it saves and sets the table name you have entered as current plot style table in the current layout.
